name: Status Check
description: If the satellite receives this command, it responds with data 'UTAT'; used to ping the satellite

name: Get Restart Info
description: Gets the restart count (number of times OBC has restarted its program), restart date/time (RTC date/time of most recent restart), and uptime (time since most recent restart)
response_info: restart count (4 bytes), restart date (3 bytes), restart time (3 bytes), uptime (4 bytes)

name: Get RTC Date and Time
description: Gets the date and time for the real-time clock.

name: Set RTC Date and Time
description: Sets the date and time for the real-time clock.

arguments.name: Date
arguments.description: 8 bits YY, 8 bits MM, 8 bits DD

arguments.name: Time
arguments.description: 8 bits HH, 8 bits MM, 8 bits SS
